block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 14 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It's a paper airplane with a really lonely name, the Space Wing by Stephen Weiss. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 013 : Sky Cruiser by Michael LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/9XLr-suSMlY Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
